subject: xm directory
correction: to find a contact by Contact ID or CID you must download the directory as a file and then search the file for the CID, or use the API to do a search request.  To do this, you need to create an API token to access the XM Directory API. Once you have the token, you can make a GET request with the CID as a parameter to retrieve the contact with matching CID

subject: salesforce extension
correction: Salesforce for Qualtrics does NOT work with hyperforce.

subject: survey
correction: A survey title is limited to 100 characters.
